name: Magma Blunthorn Rhino
description: A distant relative of the Long-Necked Rhino. Its body is covered almost entirely in a layer of hardened keratin, with the most rigid part of its back resembling cooled lava.\nWith its stable frame and gentle temper, the rhino became a favored resting perch for many birds upon moving into the Serenitea Pot. However, they were often threatened by the boisterous antics of certain canines. Fortunately, with time and adaptation, the rhinos came to accept their new companions.\nFor reasons unknown, some animals that enter the Realm Within retain their peculiar appearance shaped by the force of kuuvahki. To help Tubby identify them, Paimon has thoughtfully given them new names based on said appearance...
